name: Warrior Power Products
overview:
One of the UK’s premier suppliers of generators, air compressors and power product suppliers, we operate from a large warehouse based in the Northwest of England.

Specialising in automotive and power products, all are designed and tested to ensure the quality is maintained to pass the relevant certification. Our British expertise in electrical and mechanical engineering allows us to source the best quality products from around the world to meet our own standards.

All our products are purchased direct from the manufacturer to a very high detailed specification. With stringent production control in place as well as our bulk purchasing power, this ensures we can can offer the most competitive priced products on the market with a level of quality that is equal and it some cases better than most others on the market.

We have a large stock of Hoists, Garage & Garden Equipment, Air tools, Generators, Compressors & Power Products and to date have supplied products to over 20,000 satisfied worldwide customers. We back our products with a standard 2 year warranty if purchased from the website, with a variety of extended warranties available.

We operate a full UK service and back-up with a fully equipped workshop in the northwest of England. Our experienced staff will be only too pleased to help you.
